title: 18: No Such Thing As A Kilt On The Battlefield
content: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) & Museum of Curiosity co-producer Richard Turner (@therichturner) discuss James Joyce's tiny underpants dance, a bucket worth starting a war for, fashionable apes, and much more...
